txt_en: To improve is to change; to be perfect is to change often.
txt_cn: 要提升价值就要改变; 要达到完美就得经常改变。

txt_en: If you don't like something, change it. If you can't change it, change your attitude.
txt_cn: 如果有不满意的状况，那就试着改变它。 如果你没办法改变它，那就改变你的想法吧

txt_en: Since we cannot change reality, let us change the eyes which see reality.
txt_cn: 既然我们无法改变现实，那就改变看待现实的视角吧。

txt_en: Change in all things is sweet.
Not everything that is faced can be changed, but nothing can be changed until it is faced.
txt_cn: 不是所有你面对的事情都可以改变，但在你实际面对之前，任何事情都无法改变。

txt_en: I can't change the direction of the wind, but I can adjust my sails to always reach my destination.
txt_cn: 我没办法改变风向， 但我可以调整我的风帆，无论如何都能达到我的目的地。

txt_en: Do not fear mistakes. You will know failure. Continue to reach out.
txt_cn: 别害怕犯错，你将会遇见失败，续续把手伸出去。

txt_en: How the reeds run riot and green, as white dews are turning to frost!
I never dreamed about success, I worked for it.
txt_cn: 我从不幻想成功，我为成功奋斗。

txt_en: "The man who can make hard things easy is the educator. "
txt_cn: 能使艰难之事变得容易的人是教育者。

txt_en: The measure of intelligence is the ability to change.
txt_cn: 衡量智力的标准是适应改变的能力

txt_en: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation.
txt_cn: 与其模仿成功，不如原创失败。

txt_en: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
txt_cn: 我们对今日的怀疑是我们实现明日的唯一限制。

txt_en: If you are not willing to risk the usual, you will have to settle for the ordinary.
txt_cn: 如果你不愿意为平凡冒险，你就得甘于平凡。

txt_en: Change is inevitable. Growth is optional.
txt_cn: 改变无可避免，是否能从中成长则是你的选择。

txt_en: To do nothing is the way to be nothing.
txt_cn: 没有任何行动是通往一事无成的途径。

txt_en: A small group of thoughtful people could change the world. Indeed, it's the only thing that ever has.
txt_cn: 从古至今都是一小群有想法的人群在改变这世界。
